thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 53 of 3060
thread.title: Mrs Louise Mercer
thread.title_full: Rentalcars.com reviewed by Mrs Louise Mercer

author: Mrs Louise Mercer
title: Mrs Louise Mercer
text: Very smooth uncomplicated pick up of car. Excess of $2000 which I thought was high. Return quick and simple-make sure you return a completely full tank as rate for them to do it is very high. Check your receipt, I didn't understand the breakdown and the guy flagging in cars could'nt help me, but the office probably could. Cant comment on charge for tolls as i don't know yet.
